name: Paneliq technologies pvt ltd
description: Paneliq Technologies Pvt Ltd has been providing an efficient, effective and enjoyable staffing experience to job seekers and employers since 2021. We know that a resume is important, but it’s a piece of paper that has a story and an individual behind it. Our job as consultants is to understand the specific needs of employers and job seekers to help bring together the perfect match in expertise, skill and personality. Our clients receive objective guidance from our team of qualified experts. We do our utmost to ensure that you are given tailor-made solutions every step of the way.
features: Tailored Recruitment Excellence: Benefit from personalized recruitment solutions aligned with your company's unique culture and industry requirements.
Holistic Talent Acquisition Services: Enjoy end-to-end talent acquisition covering positions from entry-level to CXO, streamlining processes for a seamless hiring experience.
Global Reach and Industry Expertise: Access a global network of skilled professionals, enhancing your organization's competitiveness with industry-specific expertise.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
Headline: A Tech Talent Company that is Building an Eco-System Leveraging the Power of Mentoring for Career Acceleration
ShortDescription: PanelIQ Technologies is staffing agency and an employment agency that fulfils the hiring requirements of any company in accordance with the technical skills they need.
enhanced_description: Paneliq Technologies Pvt Ltd, established in 2021, is a staffing and employment agency that provides efficient, effective, and tailored talent acquisition solutions. They specialize in end-to-end recruitment services for a wide range of positions, from entry-level to CXO, ensuring a seamless hiring experience. The company acts as a consultant, focusing on understanding the specific needs, expertise, skills, personality, and unique culture of both employers and job seekers to achieve the perfect match. Paneliq leverages a global network of skilled professionals and industry-specific expertise, particularly in tech talent, to enhance organizational competitiveness. Their services aim to boost hiring manager confidence and productivity, enable faster and more efficient hiring of top talent, and reduce the overall cost of acquiring qualified employees. Beyond staffing, they also offer HR consulting and payroll services.
key_use_cases: Staffing and recruitment for various roles (entry-level to CXO)
Personalized recruitment strategy development and execution
HR consulting related to hiring best practices and process optimization
competitive_advantages: Tailored and personalized recruitment solutions aligned with company culture and industry requirements
Holistic, end-to-end talent acquisition services covering all organizational levels (entry-level to CXO)
Access to a global network of skilled professionals with industry-specific expertise
Focus on matching expertise, skill, and personality for optimal fit
roi_benefits: Faster and more efficient hiring of top talent
Reduced cost of hiring qualified employees
Increased hiring manager confidence and productivity
